text: Paroxetine, also known as Paxil, is a medicine used for the treatment of depression. It belongs to a class of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs). It has many side effects including possible insomnia and tremors. ==References== Category:Drugs used in psychiatry Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Organofluorides
title: Paroxetine
